column6: My research interest spans the domain of wireless networks, mobile/smart-phone computing and distributed computing. I am particularly interested in system development for communication ranging from broadband wireless to smart city communication. My present research focuses are broadly in following areas:

column1: Design and Development of Activity/Event Based Authentication Framework
